text: Verónica Abad Rojas (born 14 November 1976) is the Ecuadorian politician and businesswoman who was the 53rd Vice President of Ecuador from 2023 to 2025. She became the Vice President of Ecuador after winning the 2023 general election. In November 2024, Abad Rojas was temporarily suspended by the Ecuadorian government after failing to leave Israel and travel to Turkey. On 23 December 2024, Abad Rojas was ordered reinstated as Vice President after a judge ruled her suspension unconstitutional. However she was suspended again in March 2025. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Ecuadorian businesspeople Category:People from Cuenca, Ecuador Category:Ecuadorian politicians Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador
title: Verónica Abad Rojas
